summary: This script moves the mouse cursor to coordinates (1, 1) and simulates a left click. Then it types the string "123" using xdotool on a Linux system with a display set to ":3".

details.comment: This script moves the mouse cursor to coordinates (1, 1) and simulates a left click. Then it types the string "123" using xdotool on a Linux system with a display set to ":3".
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
export DISPLAY=:3
xdotool mousemove 1 1 click 1
xdotool type 123
